Title: Гіпоцентр
Description:
I have failed my people. The Coreway is impassible. Dornogal's lifeline to the Ringing Deeps has been severed as has the path beyond.

The nerubians will get their comeuppance. It is my edict as it is my will.

I will ascertain if the Councilward yet functions and bring him to the Archive. Speaker Brinthe should be there, titans willing.

But Oathsworn citizens are still in peril. If you wish to ally with us, clear the debris here and help our survivors. 

I will meet you at the Archive.
ObjectivesText: Clear debris and rescue earthen on the way to the Archive.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Baelgrim in the Archives by the Coreway.
CompletionText: The Archive looks intact, fortunately. We must keep it that way at all costs.
RewardText:
You made it.

Good.

Is that a memory gem? You should not have disturbed our dead.

But... you have brought it to the right place.
